hiveArticle.title: 2 Years on Steemit
hiveArticle.body:
SteemitBoard is kind enough to remind me that I have completed 2 years on Steemit. Thus 2 years ago the account 'codingdefined' was created on Steemit. I don't remember exactly where I got the link of Steemit but I signed up as soon as I visited the website. It is a great journey so far, where getting an appreciation of my bad photography skills and some coding effort.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQXhGB78Tx3FiroK3pjF5DZ36HCPzBfgxBkjSHwNWWHuD/image.png)

So, I along with other 97065 users have completed 2 years on Steemit, how cool is that.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmP1VdFYKmZ4Cxwprnyt5D98B6nN3hJ1rqpChMvpy8KF8Y/image.png)

Few Stats :

1. 68 Reputation
2. 1784 Followers
3. 4388 Posts & Comments
4. 4436 Steem Power
